title: Not Trade Gothic
content:
Thought it was Trade Gothic Extended, but apparently not.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type%20sample_3989.jpg)
author: homeboy

comments.content: If could be a manually expanded **[ARS Maquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110454/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/ars_maquette/)** but I think /E and /C are still a bit off

"THE LAW OFFICES" looks like **[Berthold Akzidenz Grotesk (Light Extended)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110454/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Berthold%20Akzidenz%20Grotesk%20BE%20-%20Light%20Extended&fid=12f9c8d42a7f1a03d50b247f19d108d8&fsize=60&text=THE%20LAW%20OFFICES&fit=1)**
